bibl.title: Topographical Arrangement of Tax Documents in the Philadelphia Tax Archive.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.note: The evidence from Julio-Claudian Philadelphia makes clear that in this village (like in Karanis more than a 135 years later) officials from the local tax bureau collected house-by-house. - I. Name Lists. - II. The Name List for 38/39 and Year Ledgers. - III. The Name List for 38/39 and Day Books of Collections. - IV. The Name List for 38/39 and Arrears Documents.
